Memoization classes¶

class spyral.memoize.Memoize(func)[source]¶

This is a decorator to allow memoization of function calls. It is a completely dumb cache, and will cache anything given to it indefinitely.

class spyral.memoize.SmartMemoize(func)[source]¶

This is a decorator to allow memoization of function calls. Its cache is cleared on scene changes, and also clears items from the cache which haven’t been used in at least 250 frames.
